data.name: THAT Conference
data.description: THAT Conference is the Summer Camp for Geeks that combines technology, networking, social events and exposure in an inspirational, family friendly environment at the The Kalahari Resort in Wisconsin Dells.

relatedRecords.name: Build Stuff 2020 Lithuania & Ukraine
relatedRecords.description: Nov 11-18 Vilnius & Kyiv will be hosting not just tourists but Tech Professionals from all over the world! Software development conference Build Stuff is all about the tools, frameworks, and programming languages.

relatedRecords.name: AWS Community Day Nordics 2020
relatedRecords.description: The AWS Community Day is a free full day event for AWS users organized by the community. Once a year all AWS users come together to network, learn from each other and get inspired. At this event, there will be no vendor talks, no partner talks, no sponsored talks.
